titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of the night of June 6, 2013, as "National Drive-in Movie Night" to recognize the 80th anniversary of the drive-in movie theatre.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 6/6/2013--Introduced. Supports the designation of National Drive-in Movie Night (June 6, 2013). Recognizes the historical significance of the 80th anniversary of the first exhibition of a film at a drive-in movie theatre. Recognizes the drive-in theatre as a uniquely U.S. form of family recreation and entertainment.
